+// --------------------------------------------------------------------------
+// Server functionality.
+
+// Server.
+typedef struct TF_Server TF_Server;
+
+// Creates new server.
+TF_CAPI_EXPORT extern TF_Server* TF_NewServer(const void* proto,
body_html:
Let's try to be consistent with how the other functions in this file are documented. They don't have a "Params" section but instead call out individual arguments inline and are succinct (avoiding any redundancy in comments, like talking about the status argument). For example:

// Creates a new in-process TensorFlow server configured using a serialized ServerDef protocol buffer
// provided via `proto` and `proto_len`.
//
// The server will not serve any requests until TF_ServerStart is invoked.
// The server will stop serving requests once TF_ServerStop or TF_DeleteServer is invoked.

The same for all the other functions.
